description: Schedule- LBI(No. 1) 1956 TPO T.6 - 3 Alwyne Road - Sycamore - Thin crown by 30% and treat wound  deadwood. T.69 - 5 Alwyne Place - Lime ) Prune back crown thin T.72 - 7 Alwyne Place - Lime ) by 30% T.76 - 11 Alwyne Place - Lime ) Deadwood and treat T.77 - 11 Alwyne Place - Lime ) stem wounds.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
